captions.text: As long as you don't know, how much it hurts for me
It'll be a burden for you, if you found out
Once I almost spilled everything in front of you
The happier you seem (from my heart)
The more I fall apart
My love is for you, always for you
What I have to do for you now
Is hang in there until the day I die (I’ll be missing you)
On days like today, when I feel like crying
The words I whisper in exhaustion
I love you, from the deepest of my heart
Am I doing well, or are you lying (I want to know)
You say I look good and I feel better
I almost asked if it can never really be me
I might be mistaken
but looking at your sad face
My love is for you, always for you
What I have to do for you now
Is hang in there until the day I die (I’ll be missing you)
On days like today, when I feel like crying
The words I whisper in exhaustion
I love you, from the deepest of my heart
I survive somehow, somewhere thanks to you
That's how important you are to me (I’ll be missing you)
Not too close, but not too far
I'll be here
I can promise you, from the deepest of my heart
I hope you spend the day smiling
